Literature.Title: Bacterial killing mechanism of sheep myeloid antimicrobial peptide-18 (SMAP-18) and its Trp-substituted analog with improved cell selectivity and reduced mammalian cell toxicity.
Literature.Author: Jacob B, Kim Y, Hyun JK, Park IS, Bang JK, Shin SY

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>400 µM,Mouse fibroblasts NIH 3T3:-=NA
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=8µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=4µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(no activity data),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(no activity data)
